item.title: What we know about Trump's 'framework of future deal' over Greenland
item.description: Denmark and Greenland have made it clear they will not relinquish sovereignty of the world's largest island.

item.title: MP expected to step down potentially paving way for Burnham's return
item.description: The Greater Manchester MP was suspended from Labour after reports he sent offensive messages in a WhatsApp Group

item.title: Liz Hurley 'crushed' by invasion of privacy, court told
item.description: The actress is one of seven high-profile claimants that allege the publisher of the Daily Mail and Mail on Sunday committed "grave breaches of privacy...

item.title: First asylum seekers moved into former army camp
item.description: The Home Office says 27 people seeking asylum have been housed in the training camp in East Sussex.

item.title: Ubisoft cancels six games including Prince of Persia and closes studios
item.description: The studio, known for Assassin's Creed and Just Dance, is also delaying seven titles in a restructure.
